com.hilbertinc.xml
Interface HDOMVisitor

All Known Implementing Classes:
HDumperVisitor
public interface HDOMVisitor

This interface describes the basic interface into traversing a Document Object Model (XML) tree.

Method Summary
 boolean continueTraversal()
          This returns false with the visitor is no longer interested in traversing the tree
 void processDocumentEpilog(Document document)
          This is called when a Document node is encountered in the DOM tree
 void processDocumentProlog(Document document)
          This is called when a Document node is encountered in the DOM tree
 void processDocumentType(DocumentType dtd)
          Called to handle processing of the DTD node information
 void processElementEpilog(Element node)
          This is called post-order (after the children are processed) in a recursive traversal of a DOM tree.
 void processElementProlog(Element node)
          This is called pre-order (before the children are processed) in a recursive traversal of a DOM tree.
 void processText(Text text)
          This is called to process Text nodes in the DOM tree

processElementEpilog

void processElementEpilog(Element node)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
This is called post-order (after the children are processed) in a recursive traversal of a DOM tree. The return value indicates if the traversal should continue. A return value of 'true' will continue to traverse the tree

Parameters:
element - org.w3c.dom.Element
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

processElementProlog

void processElementProlog(Element node)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
This is called pre-order (before the children are processed) in a recursive traversal of a DOM tree. The return value indicates if the traversal should continue. A return value of 'true' will continue to traverse the tree
